entry.title: My First Blog
entry.content: Hello Git users,welcome to my blog. I know it’s very simple, but believe me I’ll make it perfect soon. When I was going to build this personal blog, I met many difficulties that I never met before. I don’t know what git is, and even don’t know what the octopress is. However, so many friends support me, which I finally make the octopress framework well. Thank you all!
